descrip: In order to run protractor tests on multiple browsers, Protractor offers multiCapabilities configuration option. These options should be defined as an array of objects. As we know we can run protractor specs on different browsers by setting the browser name property of the capabilities in the conf.js file. We can execute on chrome browser by specifying browserName as chrome'

descrip: Font family names identify fonts in cascading style sheets, or CSS.
